description: Giant Hyssop (Agastache 'Tutti-frutti') is an amazing plant species that is well known for its showy white and pink flowers and sweet, fruity aroma. It is an extremely attractive plant with its deep green foliage, shiny and toothed leaves and highly aromatic, showy blooms. It is also a great choice for butterfly gardens, as its fragrant flowers entice various types of butterflies. Its drought tolerant and fairly easy to care for and adds a dramatic element to any landscape. Perfect for rock gardens, perennial beds, and containers, this hummingbird magnet brightens the surroundings with its color and beauty.
